lam yakuni alladhīna kafarū min ahli al-kitābi wal-mush'rikīna munfakkīna ḥattā tatiyahumu al-bayinatu
rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
wamā tafarraqa alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba illā min baʿdi mā jāathumu al-bayinatu
wamā umirū illā liyaʿbudū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna ḥunafāa wayuqīmū al-ṣalata wayu'tū al-zakata wadhālika dīnu al-qayimati
inna alladhīna kafarū min ahli al-kitābi wal-mush'rikīna fī nāri jahannama khālidīna fīhā ulāika hum sharru al-bariyati
inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika hum khayru al-bariyati
jazāuhum ʿinda rabbihim jannātu ʿadnin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadan raḍiya al-lahu ʿanhum waraḍū ʿanhu dhālika liman khashiya rabbahu
